exceptions.exn: In environment H : codeArityLNTF 1 <> 0 Hcorrect : codeArityLNTF (codeLNTFunction Plus) = S (LNTFunctionArity Plus) Unable to unify "1" with "0".

original: intros n H. destruct n. - exfalso. apply H. reflexivity. - pose proof (codeArityLNTFIsCorrect1 (match n with | 0 => Plus | 1 => Times | 2 => Succ | _ => Zero end)) as Hcorrect. simpl in Hcorrect. exists (match n with | 0 => Plus | 1 => Times | 2 => Succ | _ => Zero end). destruct n; simpl; reflexivity.
